alert.note: Alert for East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 2:14PM MST until January 30 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snowfall accumulations of 8 to 12 inches expected over multiple waves. * WHERE...Platte County including Glendo, Wheatland, Chugwater, and Bordeaux. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. A lull in snowfall is expected overnight tonight, with snow increasing again on Sunday afternoon and continuing through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow covered roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
